extra: The text block at the very top of the extraction ('יכלה בבני ישראל... בתורת מתנה...') is a duplicate. The text 'בתורת מתנה...' is actually the conclusion of the third source in Subchapter נא (which spans from the bottom right column to the top left column). The extraction lists this text twice: once as a standalone header and once merged into Subchapter נא.
The phrase 'יכלה בבני ישראל וכו' ומרדכי בשער המלך, פנחס)' included in the top block is a fragment from the previous page (page 96) and not a distinct source on this page.
issue_pages.assessment: The extraction is generally accurate but suffers from structural confusion regarding the text wrapping from the right column to the left, resulting in a duplicated text block and one significant OCR error in Subchapter נב.

issue_pages.assessment: The extraction successfully handled the complex/broken column layout of the page to correctly pair titles with their sources, but suffered from minor transcription errors (typos, missing letters in citations) and one incomplete sentence.

Item עז (77): The text 'הקב"ה כל טוב גס בעוה"ז' is a mashup. 'הקב"ה כל טוב' comes from the top-right snippet, while 'גס בעוה"ז' (actually 'גם בעוה"ז') is from the top snippet as well, though the text of 77 ends similarly.
